name: Amethyst Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Feedback Aura
traits.desc: Each time the dragon takes damage, all creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or else take 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
